mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ACCOUNTS (AC_NUM, ID, P_CODE, ACCOUNT_BALANCE, ACCOUNT_DATE) VALUES (#{ac_num}, #{id} , #{p_code}, 0, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT A.*, P.* FROM ACCOUNTS A INNER JOIN PRODUCTS P ON A.P_CODE = P.P_CODE WHERE A.AC_NUM =#{ac_num}
mapper.update: UPDATE ACCOUNTS SET ACCOUNT_BALANCE = ACCOUNT_BALANCE - #{money} WHERE AC_NUM = #{ac_num}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RECORDS (TRANSACTION_CODE, AC_NUM, MONEY, "TIMESTAMP", BALANCE, TYPE_OF_TRANSACTION, RECIPIENT_ACCOUNT) VALUES (RECORDS_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{ac_num}, #{money}*(-1), SYSDATE, #{account_balance}, '출금', #{recipient_account})
